subSections.title: Han character
Usage notes
subSections.text: * Despite being a non-Sino-Vietnamese reading, '''chúa''' is still used as Sino-Vietnamese in a few compounds such as {{m|vi|công chúa}}, {{m|vi|quận chúa}}, {{m|vi|lãnh chúa}}, {{m|vi|Thiên Chúa}}.
